title: Howling Blog
subtitle: Next.js and MongoDB
description: A personal blog built on top of Next.js. It has it's own CMS, dashboard page, and many more features!

title: Izuna Discord Bot
subtitle: Fastify, discord.js, Sapphire Framework
description: A Discord Bot to fulfils my daily hobby activities. Able to play music, query some information from VNDB.org, assign custom emoji-like tags, and other fun activities.

title: YTDL-Izuna
subtitle: Python, Svelte.js, AWS Lambda
description:
Ever wanted to download Youtube videos but just the audio part only? Tired of getting ads and not-so-straightforward user experience in other websites? Fret no more! as YTDL-Izuna is just here to deliver the fastest, most straightforward, and almost no restriction* on downloads

Want to try? Use this signup code!
IUXHZRLUNEGFMRAESWCZLJQGVWDBETCR

title: Mitsukeru!
subtitle: Electron.js, Express.js, React and Material UI
description:
An Inventory Management System specifically designed for Lost and Found department in Comic Frontier. An offline-first application that is meant to work locally with options to synchronize.

Currently on development with target to add companion app based on React Native for easier data collecting.

title: SIASN-BAPEK
subtitle: React.js, Material UI, Golang, Kubernetes
description:
A project from Indonesian National Civil Service Agency. A of web application for civil servant data administration.

Frontend uses React.js with Material UI for UI component, Tailwind CSS for CSS utility library. Backend uses Golang and deployed on Kubernetes
